name: MEC Organic Cotton Travel Rectangular Liner - Unisex
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
description:
Enjoy the comfort of cotton against your skin as you sleep, and keep your bag cleaner so it needs washing less often. Many trekkers also carry a liner to put a layer between themselves and hostel beds.Made of organically grown cotton.Stuff sack attached to footbox, and is made of nylon with a drawcord.Shaped to fit rectangular and barrel bags.One side is fully sewn up. Other side is partially sewn with 3 ties to make it easy to get in and out.Pocket to keep your pillow in place.Back panel length is 217cm, front panel length is 183cm, and width is 87cm.
